snippet: Ed Christian and Ladarious Phillips, who belonged to Auburn’s 32-member recruiting class of 2010, were killed in a shooting at a pool party near the school’s campus.
abstract: Former Auburn football recruits Ed Christian and Ladarious Phillips are shot and killed, along with another man, at a pool party near the school’s campus; shooting is the most disturbing in a series of off-the-field developments related to Auburn football that has tempered the joy from the team's 2010 national championship.

byline.original: By MIKE TIERNEY and PETE THAMEL
byline.contributor: Mike Tierney reported from Auburn, Ala., and Pete Thamel from Boston.

lead_paragraph: Ed Christian and Ladarious Phillips, who belonged to Auburn’s 32-member recruiting class of 2010, were killed in a shooting at a pool party near the school’s campus.

headline.seo: Auburn Shooting Leaves 3 Dead, Including 2 Former Football Recruits
headline.main: 2 Former Recruits at Auburn Are Among 3 Killed in Shooting
headline.print_headline: 2 Former Recruits at Auburn Are Among 3 Killed in Shooting
